function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High prevalence of malaria in developing and emerging economies","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria transmission and related deaths","Mitigation":"Improved access to prevention measures and treatment, public health education","Technologies":"Vector control technologies, diagnostic tools, vaccines","People":"Residents of developing and emerging economies","Owner":"Governments, international aid organizations"},{"Description":"Concentration of malaria-related deaths in sub-Saharan Africa","Impact":"High mortality rates due to malaria","Mitigation":"Investment in malaria-related intervention programs, access to healthcare, education on prevention","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure, diagnostic tools, treatment drugs","People":"Residents of sub-Saharan Africa","Owner":"International agencies, local governments, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"High number of VBD-related deaths","Impact":"Significant impact on global public health and mortality rates","Mitigation":"Investment in research, development of prevention measures, access to treatment","Technologies":"Research and development of vaccines, public health infrastructure, surveillance technologies","People":"Global population","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments, research institutions"}]}
